item.title: Analysis of the Tax Refund Case in Varian’s "Microeconomics"
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: In the classic textbook “Intermediate Microeconomics: A Modern Approach” by Varian, there is a famous “tax refund case” in Chapter 8, “Slutsky Equation” (9th Edition, Page 100). The key concepts examined are income effect and substitution effect. This article records some personal insights.
